Class ConnectorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.ckeditor.ConnectorContext

extends Object
    Context information for connector operations.

    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

public ConnectorRegistration getConnectorRegistration()

        public String getConnectorURL()
        Get the connector URL. Useful when implementing Connector.writeCKEditorConfig(ConnectorContext, java.io.PrintWriter) .
        Returns:
        the URL.

      • getCurrentWorkingDirectory

        public net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.DirectoryEntity getCurrentWorkingDirectory()
        Get the current working directory.
        Returns:
        the current working directory. This will not be null when passed to an Connector unless specified (e.g. Connector.resolvePath(ConnectorContext, String)).

      • getFileType

        public ConnectorContext.FileType getFileType()
        Get the file type being requested. If set to something other than ConnectorContext.FileType.any, then this is a hint to the connector to only provide files / directories that contain those types of files.
        Returns:
        the file type.
